author: andreas
msg: Refactored revision control: clean up XML reading+writing. RCML objects are now singletons per source URI. This allows to synchronize access per RCML object, avoiding synchronization issues which occured when running load tests. UnitOfWork.commit() and rollback() are now synchronized via the class object to avoid inter-usecase commit synchronization issues (also occured during load tests).

author: nick
msg: Further enhancements to Font Metrics support, wrt fonts with bold/italic varients, such as dialog (plus tests)

author: andreas
msg: Create continuation for usecase if preconditions failed, but don't advance/execute.

author: andreas
msg: Send notification message if a document could not be indexed (temporary workaround for bug 42510 until we have an indexing queue)
